price: Obi a ͻbɛyi boniayε no, ne boniayε no da ͻno ara so, na obi a ͻbɛdi dwuma pa no, wͻn kraa na wͻresiesie (asetena pa) ama no.
arabic: مَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيۡهِ كُفۡرُهُۥۖ وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلِأَنفُسِهِمۡ يَمۡهَدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: man kafara faʿalayhi kuf'ruhu waman ʿamila ṣāliḥan fali-anfusihim yamhadūna
